public Integer getPlayerIdByName(OfflinePlayer offlinePlayer)
        Deprecated. The use of player names to uniquely identify a user is deprecated.
        Get the ID of an offline player (by using its name).

        offlinePlayer - Player to get the ID of.
        Returns:
        BukkitGames ID of the offlinePlayer

        public Boolean getPlayerIsGameMaker(Player player)
        Check if a player is a game maker (e.g. a spectator and an admin).
        Parameters:
        player - Player to check.
        Returns:
        True if the player is a game maker.

      • getPlayerIsSpectator

        Check if a player is a spectator.
        Parameters:
        player - Player to check.
        Returns:
        True if the player is a spectator.

      • getPlayerIsTeamMember

        public Boolean getPlayerIsTeamMember(Player player,
                            Player player2)
        Check if a player is a team member of another player.
        Parameters:
        player - Player to check.
        player2 - Player to check if he is a team member.
        Returns:
        True if player2 is a team member of player.

      • getPlayerTeamMembers

        Get all team members of a player.
        Parameters:
        player - Player to get the team members from.
        Returns:

        Get the name of the player that won the last game.
        Returns:
        The name of the last winner

      • getCustomWorldName

        public String getCustomWorldName()
        Get the name of the custom world that is currently loaded. If the current world is not a custom one the method returns null.
        Returns:
        The name of the custom world or null

      • setPlayerTeamMembers

                        ArrayList<String> teamMembers)
        Set the team members of a player.
        Parameters:
        player - Player to set the team members for.
        teamMembers - ArrayList with the names of all team members.

      • setPlayerBalance

        public void setPlayerBalance(Player player,
                    int balance)
        Set the balance for a player.
        Parameters:
        player - Player to set the balance for.
        balance - The money to set the player's balance to.

      • setOfflinePlayerBalance

        public void setOfflinePlayerBalance(int playerId,
                           int balance)
        Set a player's balance using his player ID. This task will be executed async.
        Parameters:
        playerId - Player to set the balance for.
        balance - The money to set the player's balance to.

      • startNextWorldVoting

        public void startNextWorldVoting(int optionsAmount)
        Starts a new next world voting. This will override any previous votings.
        Parameters:
        optionsAmount - The amount of options the voting should have.

      • getPlayerBalance

        public int getPlayerBalance(Player player)
        Get the balance of a player.
        Parameters:
        player - Player to get the balance of.
        Returns:
        The current balance the player has.

      • getOfflinePlayerBalance

        public Integer getOfflinePlayerBalance(int playerId)
        Get the balance of a player using his player ID.
        Parameters:
        playerId - Player to get the balance of.
        Returns:
        The current balance the player has.

      • getPlayerCanUseAbility

        public Boolean getPlayerCanUseAbility(Player player,
                             Integer abilityID,
                             Boolean message)
        Check if a player has the ability and the ability is not on cooldown.
        Parameters:
        player - Player to check.
        abilityID - AbilityID to check for.
        message - Whether to send a message to the player when the ability is on cooldown.
        Returns:
        True if the player can use the ability at the moment.

      • getPlayerAbilityIsOnCooldown

        public Boolean getPlayerAbilityIsOnCooldown(Player player,
                                   Integer abilityID,
                                   Boolean message)
        Check if an ability is on cooldown for a player, ignoring if the player can actually use the ability.
        Parameters:
        player - Player to check.
        abilityID - AbilityID to check for.
        message - Whether to send a message to the player when the ability is on cooldown.
        Returns:
        True if the ability of the player is on cooldown.

      • setPlayerCooldown

        public void setPlayerCooldown(Player player,
                     Integer abilityID,
                     Integer seconds)
        Set a cooldown for an ability of a player.
        Parameters:
        player - Player to set the cooldown to.
        abilityID - AbilityID to set the cooldown for.
        seconds - Length of the cooldown in seconds.

      • getPlayerHasAbility

        public Boolean getPlayerHasAbility(Player player,
                          Integer abilityID)
        Check if a player has an ability, ignoring if the ability is on cooldown for this player.
        Parameters:
        player - Player to check.
        abilityID - AbilityID to check for.
        Returns:
        Boolean True if the player has the ability.

      • registerNewAbility

        public void registerNewAbility(Integer id,
                      String name,
                      String description)
                        throws AbilityExistsException
        Register a new ability, should to be called in onEnable().
        Parameters:
        id - AbilityID of the ability.
        name - Name of the ability.
        description - Description of the ability.
        Throws:
        AbilityExistsException - When an ability with this abilityID already exists.
